  • lookAt(eye: Vector3, target: Vector3, up?: Vector3): void

  • Creates a quaternion that rotates the vector eye to point towards target

      The vector representing the starting point

    • target: Vector3

      The vector representing the target point

    • up: Vector3 = Vector3.UP

setEulerAngles

  • setEulerAngles(x: number, y: number, z: number, order?: string): void

  • Sets the quaternion values using Euler angles

    Parameters

    • x: number

      The x-axis rotation angle in radians

    • y: number

      The y-axis rotation angle in radians

    • z: number

      The z-axis rotation angle in radians

    • order: string = 'YZX'

      The order in which the rotation angles are applied (defaults to 'YZX')

    Returns void

    • q2: Quaternion
